channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Uttarakhand helicopter crash pilot Lt Col Rajveer Singh Chauhan was a new father of twins
item.description: A serene morning turned into a scene of devastation as a helicopter crash near Gaurikund claimed seven lives, including a revered Indian Army veteran.
item.author: Michael D. Carroll
item.media:keywords: Flights, Aircraft, Uttarakhand helicopter crash, Rajveer Singh Chauhan, Aryan Aviation, flight safety regulations

media:content.media:description: Captain Rajveer Singh Chauhan was among the seven killed after the helicopter carrying pilgrims of t

media:thumbnail.media:description: Captain Rajveer Singh Chauhan was among the seven killed after the helicopter carrying pilgrims of t

item.title: Iran-Israel LIVE: Netanyahu threatens to kill Iran's Khamenei and 'end the conflict'
item.description: Tehran announced it had launched some 100 missiles and vowed further retaliation for Israel's sweeping attacks on its military and nuclear infrastructure.
item.author: Charlotte Becquart,Jon King,Ciaran McGrath,William Morgan,Rebecca Robinson
item.media:keywords: Iran-Israel conflict, Iran, Israel, World War 3, strikes, Israel-Iran conflict, missile strike, child casualties, WW3 fears

media:content.media:description: An Ultra-Orthodox Jewish man outside a badly damaged building in Bnie Brak

media:thumbnail.media:description: An Ultra-Orthodox Jewish man outside a badly damaged building in Bnie Brak

item.title: Major energy bill alert as Israel and Iran conflict escalates
item.description: Brits have been warned that the conflict between Israel and Iran could have major implications for energy bills and inflation.
item.author: Conor Wilson
item.media:keywords: Iran, Iran-Israel conflict, Israel, Energy bills, Inflation, Bank of England, Oil prices, war, Tehran, Tel Aviv, Jerusalem,

media:content.media:description: The conflict has already seen oil prices rise sharply

media:thumbnail.media:description: The conflict has already seen oil prices rise sharply

item.title: Awkward moment Mark Carney humiliates Trump by savagely cutting him off at G7
item.description: The media was subsequently ushered out of the room while Mr Trump made a peculiar gesture with his right hand, waving his fingers.
item.author: Rebecca Robinson
item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, Mark Carney, G7 summit, Immigration, G7 Summit, Immigration Policy, donald trump g7, mark carney, trump carney g7, mark carney cuts off donald trump

media:content.media:description: Mark Carney cut off Donald Trump during a G7 press conference.

item.title: EU pleads with Donald Trump on tariffs ahead of major G7 meeting
item.description: EU leaders look set to use this weeks G7 summit to persuade Donald Trump to ease his tariff dispute which threatens severe impacts for the global economy.
item.author: Conor Wilson
item.media:keywords: NATO, Ursula von der Leyen, European Union, G7 summit, Donald Trump, World Economy, defence spending, tariffs, global economy

media:content.media:description: Trump's tariff policy would have severe impacts for the European economy

item.title: Body language expert reveals Meloni's true feelings towards Trump meeting
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: The Italian leader was seen leaning closely towards French President Emmanuel Macron, with her hand covering most of her face.
item.author: Kris Boratyn
item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, Body language, G7 summit, Giorgia Meloni, G7 Summit, Body Language

media:content.media:description: Giorgia Meloni appeared less than impressed during the G7 summit.

item.title: Air India: Brit made late decision to miss flight - and he was meant to be in seat 11A
item.description: He was in meetings, phone on silent, when news of the crash broke, with his wife fearing the worst.
item.author: Kris Boratyn
item.media:keywords: Air India plane crash, India, Essex, Air India crash, Owen Jackson, Vishwash Kumar Ramesh, Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner, Brit made last minute seat change on doomed air india flight, Air India crash latest

item.title: easyJet passengers 'smell smoke' as plane makes emergency landing
item.description: The Airbus A320 had taken off from Paphos bound for Bristol but was forced to make an emergency landing at Izmir, Turkey.
item.author: Charlie Jones,Eve Beattie,Hannah Kane

item.title: Shocking moment Iranian state TV is bombed live on air by Israel
item.description: Chilling footage captured the moment a missile struck the building, with the impact sending dust and rubble flying across the set.
item.author: Rebecca Robinson
item.media:keywords: Iran, Iran-Israel conflict, Israel, Iranian state TV bombing, Israel-Iran conflict, Tehran evacuation, Israeli Defence Forces

media:content.media:description: Iranian state TV was bombed live on air.

item.title: Panic in Greece with beaches left empty as tourists snub country for Turkey
item.description: The weak lira is a contributing factor, as it makes Turkey a more affordable option in 2025, with even high-end resorts feeling accessible.
item.author: Rebecca Robinson
item.media:keywords: Greece holidays, Turkey holidays, Money saving, Greek islands, Greece tourism decline, Turkey tourism surge, budget-conscious travellers, Greek islands pricing issues

media:content.media:description: Tourists are choosing Turkey over Greece.

media:thumbnail.media:description: Tourists are choosing Turkey over Greece.
